https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/h6Zo1LZcXlnoPhgDlT5FEVNkyhD.jpg Following the failure of his last mission, RFG spy Michael Roddick decides to disappear, taking along Elena, the daughter of a Russian spy who died under strange circumstances. They settle in Barcelona and open a restaurant, to help them to forget about the past. Nevertheless, his former colleagues reappear alleging there are still some matters yet to be settled. Black Flowers
